comment: The bookies have as favourite to become the next prime minister. If it happens, it will be because we didnt know what we were voting for. Well need an immediate Peoples Vote to get rid of him.

(m / multi-sentence

                        :mod (p / prime)

                  :ARG1 b
                  :ARG3 (e / equal)))
      :snt2 (c / cause-01

                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (t / thing

            :ARG1 b2
            :condition (ii / it))

                  :mod (p2 / Peoples)
                  :time (ii2 / immediate)
